body.p: If you look inside the bundle-frameworks\oxygen-frameworks folder distributed with the sample project, it contains a framework folder. Customizations that affect the framework configuration for the component should first be done in a standalone installation of .

An standalone installation includes a frameworks folder that contains the dita framework located in \frameworks\dita. The dita framework contains a bundled DITA-OT distribution which contains the DTDs used for DITA editing. If your DTD specialization is a DITA OT plugin, it should be installed in the \plugins folder.
To make changes to the DITA framework configuration, and go to Document Type Association. These changes will affect the \frameworks\dita\dita.framework configuration file.

After you do this you can re-pack the following the instructions from the README.html file located in the oxygen-sample-applet project. The Author Component sample project and the standalone installation should be of the same version.
